Properties  

askingActor

msg_neu.t[5678]

the actor who's asking for the topic list (usually the PC)

isExplicit

msg_neu.t[5675]

flag: this is an explicit listing (i.e., a TOPICS command)

scopeList

msg_neu.t[5684]

our cached scope list for the actor

targetActor

msg_neu.t[5681]

the actor we're talking to
